definition: to depend on/to hang on in a place/bad/to renege (on promise)/to disclaim/to rat (on debts)/rascally/to blame/to put the blame on

sentences.english: Know you don't like me, I have repeatedly among you stay?
sentences.chinese: 知道你不喜歡我，我還要死皮賴臉的留在你們兩頭嗎？

sentences.english: And I don't stay where I'm not wanted.
sentences.chinese: 再說，別人嫌棄我，我也不會死皮賴臉地住在這兒。

sentences.english: I hope they are not so impertinent as to follow us.
sentences.chinese: 但願他們別死皮賴臉地跟着我們。

sentences.english: Once he is here, he won't leave; he just sits there as bold as brass.
sentences.chinese: 他一來了就不走，死皮賴臉地坐在那兒。
